body:
Now, I have downloaded a workshop map for some fun in CSGO. 

My steam link is here -> http://steamcommunity.com/id/RealLFT/

Comment here or add me to be in the matches!

Will be starting this later today when I have enough people :)!

We will be using avicus ts [unless told by staff we can not]
Anyone is welcome to play :)!

Details:
Random teams
Decoy's are the dodgeball
Were doing this to have fun
I will be recording
You MUST download the map.
